mapper.select: select goodsCode from goods where goodsCode=#{goodscode}
select sellerCRN ,goodsName ,goodsPrice ,goodsQuantity ,goodsOimage ,goodsSimage ,goodsCode ,goodsInfo ,goodsDateOfUpload from goods where goodsCode=#{goodsCode}
select sellerCRN from seller where sellerId = #{sellerId}

select s.sellerCRN as sellerCRN , s.sellerShopName as sellerShopName , g.goodsName as goodsName , g.goodsPrice as goodsPrice , g.goodsQuantity as goodsQuantity from SELLER s, GOODS g where s.sellerCRN = g.sellerCRN and s.sellerCRN = #{sellerCRN}
select buyerPhone from Buyer b, FAVORITE f where b.buyerId = f.buyerId and f.buyerId in (select buyerId from favorite where sellerCRN = #{sellerCRN}) group by b.buyerPhone
select buyerId from FAVORITE where sellerCRN = #{sellerCRN}
select g.goodsName, s.sellerShopName from goods g, SELLER s where g.sellerCRN = s.sellerCRN and g.goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
